title: The Taming Of The Hart
description: Following the Earl of Brimshire's death, his Son Sebastian Hart, must return from exile to retain the title. Sebastian is now a fully trained assassin and has to prove to his family and the whole of London that he is not the arrogant and spoilt rake he once was, but his enemies are out in force to prove otherwise.Lady Kathryn Hamilton is a loyal family friend and has loved Sebastian from a young age, turning down offers of marriage in the hope that one day he would return and finally notice her, but knowing his past and the women he has taken for lovers, she resigns herself to the fact that she will never have her love reciprocated.Follow their journey of love and heartache as obstacles and challenges are thrown in the road to happiness.
author: Lorraine Burgess
